name: pyprismatic
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: pyprismatic
    version: 1.2.1
source:
    patches:
        - 0001-Fix-GUI_SOURCE_FILE-in-CMakeLists.txt.patch
        - 0001-fftw_cmake.patch
        - 0001-fix_pyprismatic_macos.patch
    sha256: 844f659575dd98999b7c4864e850a7ec735f297ab1fb6c2d2be91d7f9720fe70
    url: https://github.com/prism-em/prismatic/archive/1.2.1.tar.gz
build:
    number: 5
    script: bash ${RECIPE_DIR}/build_pyprismatic.sh
    string: py36_cpu_hbba3a6d_5
requirements:
    build:
        - bzip2 1.0.8 h0b31af3_2
        - ca-certificates 2020.4.5.1 hecc5488_0
        - cctools 927.0.2 h5ba7a2e_4
        - clang 9.0.1 default_hf57f61e_0
        - clang_osx-64 9.0.1 h05bbb7f_0
        - clangxx 9.0.1 default_hf57f61e_0
        - clangxx_osx-64 9.0.1 h05bbb7f_0
        - cmake 3.17.0 hd28f656_0
        - compiler-rt 9.0.1 h6a512c6_3
        - compiler-rt_osx-64 9.0.1 h99342c6_3
        - expat 2.2.9 h4a8c4bd_2
        - krb5 1.17.1 h1752a42_0
        - ld64 450.3 h3c32e8a_4
        - libcurl 7.69.1 hc0b9707_0
        - libcxx 10.0.0 0
        - libedit 3.1.20170329 hcfe32e1_1001
        - libiconv 1.15 h0b31af3_1006
        - libllvm9 9.0.1 ha1b3eb9_0
        - libssh2 1.8.2 hcdc9a53_2
        - libuv 1.34.0 h0b31af3_0
        - make 4.3 h0b31af3_0
        - ncurses 6.1 h0a44026_1002
        - openssl 1.1.1f h0b31af3_0
        - pkg-config 0.29.2 hdc84dc8_1006
        - rhash 1.3.6 h1de35cc_1001
        - tapi 1000.10.8 ha1b3eb9_4
        - tk 8.6.10 hbbe82c9_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h0b31af3_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h0b31af3_1006
    host:
        - boost 1.72.0 py36hbf1eeb5_0
        - boost-cpp 1.72.0 hdf9ef73_0
        - bzip2 1.0.8 h0b31af3_2
        - ca-certificates 2020.4.5.1 hecc5488_0
        - certifi 2020.4.5.1 py36h9f0ad1d_0
        - fftw 3.3.8 nompi_h44ae4c8_1110
        - h5py 2.10.0 nompi_py36h106b333_102
        - hdf5 1.10.5 nompi_h3e39495_1104
        - icu 64.2 h6de7cb9_1
        - libblas 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libcblas 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libcxx 10.0.0 0
        - libffi 3.2.1 h4a8c4bd_1007
        - libgfortran 4.0.0 2
        - liblapack 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libopenblas 0.3.9 h3d69b6c_0
        - llvm-openmp 10.0.0 h28b9765_0
        - ncurses 6.1 h0a44026_1002
        - numpy 1.18.1 py36hdc5ca10_1
        - openssl 1.1.1f h0b31af3_0
        - python 3.6.10 h4334963_1010_cpython
        - python_abi 3.6 1_cp36m
        - readline 8.0 hcfe32e1_0
        - setuptools 46.1.3 py36h9f0ad1d_0
        - six 1.14.0 py_1
        - sqlite 3.30.1 h93121df_0
        - tk 8.6.10 hbbe82c9_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h0b31af3_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h0b31af3_1006
    ignore_run_exports:
        - boost
    run:
        - fftw >=3.3.8,<4.0a0
        - h5py
        - hdf5 >=1.10.5,<1.10.6.0a0
        - libcxx >=9.0.1
        - numpy
        - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
        - python_abi 3.6.* *_cp36m
test:
    commands:
        - python -c "import pyprismatic; pyprismatic.demo()"
about:
    description: 'CPU / GPU software for fast simulation of Scanning Transmission
        Electron Microscopy (STEM) experiments

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/prism-em/prismatic
    home: http://prism-em.com/
    license: GPL-3.0-only
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: CPU / GPU software for fast simulation of Scanning Transmission Electron
        Microscopy (STEM) experiments
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - douglowe
        - ericpre
        - tschoonj
